hero.text: Teaming up with Junior Enterprise ENSA Agadir is your way to get hold of a wide range of skills provided by future engineers in different fields.

cjem.title: WHAT IS CJEM
cjem.text: JEEA operates under the umbrella of CJEM (Confédération Marocaine des Juniors Entrepreneurs),which is the founder structure of the Junior-Entrepreneurship movement in Morocco, with the aim of promoting the concept of JE's at the national level, but also to ensure that the status of Junior Enterprises is legally recognized and valued by companies. For more information: https://cjem.ma/

jeea.title: WHO ARE WE
jeea.text: The JEEA (Junior Enterprise ENSA Agadir) is a branch of the JE (Junior Enterprise) that aims to enhance young entrepreneurs' skills before they enter the professional world. Founded by ENSA-A students, it offers a unique opportunity for junior entrepreneurs to enter the job market. Additionally, it provides quality services to clients in various fields.

services.title: OUR SERVICES
services.recrute: Join us! We invite you to become part of JEEA and a member of a highly motivated team of junior entrepreneurs.
services.activities: Events and trainings. Discover all our events and trainings provided by experts in order to keep up with the latest market trends.
services.projects: Discover our projects. Our initiation encompasses the company's mission, core values, challenges and promises.
services.services: A Junior Enterprise for every need! We accompany you in the realization of your projects by offering quality services to guarantee your satisfaction.

contact.title: CONTACT US
contact.text: Entrust your projects to our students
